title: Core PCE Cools to 2.8%, Boosting Trader Expectations for Fed Policy Support
description: Core PCE cooled to 2.8% as income and spending eased, reinforcing expectations for a cautious Fed and supporting a near-term bullish tilt in rate-sensitive assets.
content:
Spending Slows as Services Dominate Consumption
Personal consumption expenditures increased 0.3%, driven almost entirely by a $63.0 billion gain in services spending. Goods spending contributed a mo… [+1560 chars]
